Home Road map

When

Every step is planned

Importance

Of planning

Our goals

We would all our clients to become rich people. Because then our company will become even richer and more influential, because we are sure:

The overall success of the team is the sum of the success of each its members!

Inevitability of success

We are moving forward by pinpointing current sources of high income and joining forces with each client. Thus, we get a strong team of investors with great opportunities to earn money in the areas of mining, stock markets, crypto trading and artificial intelligence.

Road map

Here is a Road Map developed for several years to the future. In fact, the Road Map is our development plan, which we strictly adhere to.

Start

2020

2020 Quarter 1

Platform development beginning

Developing a reliable crypto-trading platform to use various cryptocurrencies as a financial instrument with advanced features.

2020 Quarter 2

Initial cryptomining development

Developing efficient and scalable cryptomining operations to ensure optimal business performance and profitability.

2020 Quarter 3

Scientific resources

Development of knowledge-intensive resources for risk management and investment strategies and for making informed investment decisions.

2020 Quarter 4

Formation of trading strategy

Initial formation of a trading strategy based on the first experience of working with cryptocurrency funds.

2021

2021 Quarter 4

Strengthening the analytical direction

In order to optimize the processes has been launched the formation of a new team of financial and trading analysts.

2021 Quarter 3

Start of development of proprietary software

The first steps towards complete technological independence in the form of independent development of algorithmic software.

2021 Quarter 2

Initial formation of the future team

The beginning of the core team formation from among like-minded Robert Hoffman.

2021 Quarter 1

Customer Expansion

Based on initial successes in online investing, performing the expanding of the clients base.

2022

2022 Quarter 1

New trading solutions

Development of algorithms that help quickly and without risk to identify the most promising transactions and stock exchanges trends from the point of view of our business.

2022 Quarter 2

Increasing the platform

Creating new jobs due to the increase in the number of customers and the development of the platform in the right directions.

2022 Quarter 3

Formation of large working capital

Due to many successful deals, for the first time it was possible to form working capital not only for transactions but further development of the platform.

2022 Quarter 4

Technical Platform Upgrade

Buying equipment with improved performance, including for cryptocurrency trading and mining.

2023

2023 Quarter 4

Expand the range of products and services

Expanding cryptocurrency offerings such as stablecoins, confidential coins and DeFi tokens.

2023 Quarter 3

Improving the user experience.

Improve the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of an online platform to provide a more convenient investment process.

2023 Quarter 2

Improving Platform Security

Developing and implementation even more robust security measures to protect user data and financial transactions.

2023 Quarter 1

Creation of Ovax Global

Implementation of the online platform directly as an investment trading company.

2024

2024 Quarter 1

Support improvement

Strengthen clients support by investing in automated customer support capabilities. Such as chatbots, automatic e-mail responses, etc.

2024 Quarter 2

Enchanced Crypto Trading Opportunities

Investing part of the funds in modern equipment for automatic trading in order to significantly increase the maximum profit, increase the speed of its receipt and expand the company’s activities in this direction.

2024 Quarter 3

Cryptostaking service development

This service will allow clients to place their cryptocurrencies in a staking, thereby providing additional investment opportunities and increasing revenue streams.

2024 Quarter 4

Artificial intelligence

Development of artificial intelligence on the platform, allowing investors to set up automatic investment processes without their further participation.

2025

2025 Quarter 4

Cryptocurrency lending

The start of a cryptocurrency lending service that allows clients to receive interest on their assets or borrow cryptocurrency for short-term use, expanding the company’s and investors revenue streams and providing additional investment opportunities.

2025 Quarter 3

Primary IPO

Launch the process of raising additional capital to expand the business and attract institutional investors.

2025 Quarter 2

Expanding market coverage

Launch a marketing campaign to reach new user segments and increase brand awareness, including social media ads, content marketing and influencer partnerships.

2025 Quarter 1

Start of the initial ICO

Launch of ICO to fund the development of new platform features and services and raise capital from the cryptocurrency community.

then our company will become even richer and more
influential, because we are sure:
